title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8141.13 - Town of Clifton Park
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8141.13 - Town of Clifton Park

State Regulations
(a) Pierce

Road. The northbound and southbound roadways of Pierce Road, a town highway, between Ushers Road and a point 0.4+- mile south of Ushers Road. (b) Ushers Road. Ushers Road, Route 822, between Pierce Road and US Route 9. (c) US Route 9. US Route 9 between Ushers

Road, Route 822, and Northway Reefer & Truck Outfitters, Inc. terminal, a
distance of 1.2+- miles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8141.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
